creator: Rebecca Bellan
title: (No AI) Google VP warns that two types of AI startups may not survive
dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
content: As generative AI evolves, a Google VP warns that LLM wrappers and AI aggregators face mounting pressure, with shrinking margins and limited differentiation threatening their long-term viability.
contentSnippet: As generative AI evolves, a Google VP warns that LLM wrappers and AI aggregators face mounting pressure, with shrinking margins and limited differentiation threatening their long-term viability.

creator: Tim Fernholz
title: (No AI) OpenAI debated calling police about suspected Canadian shooter’s chats
dc:creator: Tim Fernholz
content: Jesse Van Rootselaar's descriptions of gun violence were flagged by tools that monitor ChatGPT for misuse.
contentSnippet: Jesse Van Rootselaar's descriptions of gun violence were flagged by tools that monitor ChatGPT for misuse.

title: (No AI) Suspect in Tumbler Ridge school shooting described violent scenarios to ChatGPT
author: Terrence O’Brien
content:
![](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/gettyimages-2260625085.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

The suspect in the [mass shooting at Tumbler Ridge](https://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/livestory/active-shooter-alert-tumbler-ridge-secondary-school-bc-live-updates-9.7083740), British Columbia, Jesse Van Rootselaar, was raising alarms among employees at OpenAI months before the shooting took place. This past June, Jesse had conversations with ChatGPT involving descriptions of gun violence that triggered the chatbot's automated review system. Several employees raised concerns that her posts could be a precursor to real-world violence and encouraged company leaders to contact the authorities, but they ultimately declined.

According to the _[Wall Street Journal](http://redible%20and%20imminent%20risk%20of%20serious%20physical%20harm%20to%20others.)_, leaders at the company decided that Rootselaar's posts did not constitute a "credible and imminent risk of …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/ai-artificial-intelligence/882814/tumbler-ridge-school-shooting-chatgpt)

Several employees raised concerns that her posts could be a precursor to real-world violence and encouraged company leaders to contact the authorities, but they ultimately declined. 
According to the Wall Street Journal, leaders at the company decided that Rootselaar's posts did not constitute a "credible and imminent risk of …

title: (No AI) Trump is making coal plants even dirtier as AI demands more energy
author: Justine Calma
content:
![A photo of emissions rising from coal plant along a lake shore. ](https://platform.theverge.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2026/02/gettyimages-1140674387.jpg?quality=90&strip=all&crop=0,0,100,100)

Kingston Fossil Plant, a 1.4-gigawatt coal-fired power plant located in Roane County, just outside Kingston, Tennessee on the shore of Watts Bar Lake. | Photo: Getty Images

The Trump administration just tossed out Biden-era restrictions on mercury and other toxic pollutants from power plants. It's repealing [Mercury and Air Toxics Standards](https://www.epa.gov/stationary-sources-air-pollution/mercury-and-air-toxics-standards) (MATS) just as [electricity demand in the US ticks up](https://www.eia.gov/todayinenergy/detail.php?id=65264) with the buildout of new AI data centers.

Those standards are particularly impactful when it comes to pollution from coal plants [responsible for around half of mercury emissions](https://19january2017snapshot.epa.gov/mercury/basic-information-about-mercury_.html) in the US. Mercury is a neurotoxin; high exposure has been [linked to birth defects and learning disabilities in children](https://wwwn.cdc.gov/TSP/ToxFAQs/ToxFAQsDetails.aspx?faqid=113&toxid=24). Exposure can also impact the kidneys and nervous system.

> Trump's deregulation spree aims to make it easier to quickly constr …

[Read the full story at The Verge.](https://www.theverge.com/science/882288/trump-ai-data-center-power-plant-pollution-mercury-mats)

title: (No AI) Advancing independent research on AI alignment

title: (No AI) A new way to express yourself: Gemini can now create music
content: The Gemini app now features our most advanced music generation model Lyria 3, empowering anyone to make 30-second tracks using text or images.

creator: Steven Levy
title: (No AI) AI Safety Meets the War Machine
dc:creator: Steven Levy
content: Anthropic doesn’t want its AI used in autonomous weapons or government surveillance. Those carve-outs could cost it a major military contract.
contentSnippet: Anthropic doesn’t want its AI used in autonomous weapons or government surveillance. Those carve-outs could cost it a major military contract.

creator: Rhett Allain
title: (No AI) Could AI Data Centers Be Moved to Outer Space?
dc:creator: Rhett Allain
content: Massive data centers for generative AI are bad for the Earth. How about launching them into orbit?
contentSnippet: Massive data centers for generative AI are bad for the Earth. How about launching them into orbit?
